author: Harry Johnson
description: A splash of floral red curaçao, raspberry syrup and the merest touch of maraschino delicately flavour and slightly sweeten this spirit-forward brandy-based cocktail.Beware making this cocktail with more widely available orange curaçao rather than red curaçao as this produces a very different tasting and looking cocktail.
name: East India No.1

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
